wikitext.*:
'''''The Journal of Inklings Studies''''' is the journal of The Oxford University C.S. Lewis Society, The Charles Williams Society, The Owen Barfield Literary Estate and The G.K. Chesterton Library. 

==From the publishers==

''The Journal of Inklings Studies'' provides a forum for rigorous academic engagement with the thought of C.S. Lewis, J.R.R. Tolkien, Charles Williams, Owen Barfield, and their intellectual and literary peers and forebears.

In this way, it seeks to contribute to the reception of these thinkers in theology, philosophy, and literary studies, both in the UK and worldwide.
